summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeHOURGLASS Equilibrium Intensive Hydrating Eye Balm is clinically proven to provide up to eight hours of hydration while reducing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and puffiness.
details: DetailsBenefitsNon-comedogenicSmooths the undereye area after three days of useReduces the appearance of dark circles after three days of useRich, balmy texture instantly hydrates and plumpsClinically proven to provide undereye hydration for up to eight hoursReduces the appearance of puffiness, fine lines and wrinklesPetrolatum-free formula soothes the undereyeNo tacky or greasy dry-downOphthalmologist-testedVegan and cruelty-freeKey IngredientsHOURGLASS Amino Youth Lipids: Accelerates natural cell turnover and replenishes moisture with restoring lipids for radiant, youthful-looking skinHydration Barrier Complex: Improves moisture content to strengthen skin barrierCocoa Seed Extract: Visibly smooths and reduces the appearance of fine linesFormulated WithoutAlcoholGlutenParabensPhthalatesSulfatesTalcPetrolatumItem 2623376How To UseFor the best results, gently apply a thin layer to the undereye area at night. To use during the day, apply about half the amount you use at night. Allow the product to fully absorb before applying makeup.IngredientsGlycerin, Triethylhexanoin, Methyl Trimethicone, Diglycerin, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Behenate, Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Water/Aqua, Ascorbic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Glyceryl Glucoside, Lecithin, Phoenix Dactylifera (Date) Seed, Phospholipids, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Tocopherol.*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of HOURGLASS's commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For the best results, gently apply a thin layer to the undereye area at night. To use during the day, apply about half the amount you use at night. Allow the product to fully absorb before applying makeup.
ingredients: Tocopherol.*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of HOURGLASS's commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. reviews.headline: YES, YES, YES
reviews.comments: Only product that helps my wrinkles at age 72! I wish I had known about it before 2022. I have used almost every eye serum, eye cream, undereye treatments since I was in my forties, Hourglass is the best product I have found.

reviews.headline: Best Eye Balm Out There
reviews.comments: I tried this eye balm after it was recommended by a popular makeup artist. I absolutely love it. Yeah its pricey but this jar will last forever - quality and quantity. I use the tiniest dab under each eye every night - like touch my ring finger onto the surface of the product and that picks up enough for one eye. It has the consistency of a thick ointment like aquaphor so you dont want to use too much. This is the only eye product I've ever used that actually hydrates my undereye area and helps reduce the look of wrinkles as a result. If youre on the fence, just get it!

reviews.headline: Sad & Disappointed
reviews.comments: I've waited to write this review because I really wanted to give this a chance to prove it's effectiveness, sadly I purchased this in April and its now July, and I don't see any changes that I feel justified the high price for this product. Feels like petroleum jelly, which would have been way less expensive. Sadly at this time I cannot return item due to the time I've given this product to prove me wrong.

reviews.headline: Love this balm
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this balm super hydrating ive been using a sample for about a month my undereyes look more hydrated less wrinkles I am def purchasing!
